messages.content: What is the biggest city in the world?
The biggest city in the world in terms of population is Tokyo, Japan. As of 2021, the population of the city is estimated to be around 13.2 million people.

The source of the information that Tokyo is the biggest city in the world in terms of population is the United Nations Department of Economic and Social Affairs. They keep track of the world's largest cities through their World Urbanization Prospects report, which is released every two years. According to the latest report, released in 2021, Tokyo has a population of around 13.2 million people and is the largest city in the world.
